steps.title: Work from the base of the curtain to the top.
steps.content: Work from the base of the curtain to the top.

steps.title: Fold back the lining or interlining.
steps.content: Fold back the lining or interlining. Stitch through both the lining/interlining and the main fabric. Your thread should go in and then come up.

steps.title: Pick up only a couple of threads with each stitch.
steps.content: Pick up only a couple of threads with each stitch.

steps.title: Make the next stitch about 2 inches/5cm along the lining/interlining.
steps.content: Make the next stitch about 2 inches/5cm along the lining/interlining. At all times keep the stitching slack.

steps.title: Continue in this manner all of the way from the base of the fabric to the top.
steps.content: Continue in this manner all of the way from the base of the fabric to the top.

steps.title: Tie off and knot the end.
steps.content: Tie off and knot the end. Cut to remove the remaining thread length. Done.
